pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, February 7, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vaughan, Ontario

10:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will tour the Maple GO train station and deliver remarks to highlight the regional transit expansion project. A media availability will follow.

Maple GO Station
30 Station Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive to the Maple GO Station building no later than 10:00 a.m.
    • Parking for media will be available in the Kiss and Ride lanes on the south side of the station building.

Toronto, Ontario

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Toronto Region Board of Trade President Janet De Silva as part of the Toronto Region Board of Trade Annual Dinner. Minister of Small Business and Export Promotion Mary Ng, Minister of Science and Sport Kirsty Duncan, and Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Ahmed Hussen will be in attendance.

North Building
Metro Toronto Convention Centre
255 Front Street West

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage for armchair discussion
    • Media are required to RSVP to Salima Virani, svirani@bot.com.
    • Media are asked to present themselves to registration in the main lobby of the North Building, via the Front Street entrance, no later than 6:00 p.m.
